<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// checkBackendInstrumentation - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// checkFrontendInstrumentation - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// range. It extracts the expected weights from the MD&#95;prof weights attached</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to the instruction, which are assumed to come from profiling data</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// attached by the frontend prior to llvm.expect intrinsic lowering. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ExpectedWeights parameter and the extracted real weights are then passed to</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// checkExpectAnnotations - compares PGO counters to the thresholds used</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for llvm.expect and warns if the PGO counters are outside of the expected</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// range. It extracts the expected weights from the MD&#95;prof weights attached</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to the instruction, which are assumed to come from lowered llvm.expect</Highlight></CodeLine>
